{{ product.name }}

Description: {{ product.description }}

Precio: {{product.price}} import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from '../products'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product', templateUrl: './product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product.component.css'] }) export class ProductComponent { showBasicDialog() { throw new Error('Method not implemented.'); } @Input() product!:Product; share() { window.alert('The product has been shared!'); } onNotify() { window.alert('You will be notified when the product goes on sale'); } displayBasic: boolean = false; showDialog() { this.displayBasic = true; } }
